item.title: What the Potomac River Sewage Spill Reveals About U.S. Water Infrastructure
item.description: On January 19, a sewer collapse outside Washington, D.C., resulted in the largest wastewater spill in U.S. history, raising concerns about the broader challenges facing U.S. water infrastructure.
